name: Zombies Run the Streets
description:
In a world taken over by zombies, heroes are needed...

Suit up and get ready to take out all the zombies!

Roam the street as you shoot zombies to survive.
____________________________________________

• Endless gameplay
• Multiple characters
• Multi-control options
• Simple arcade game for all ages
____________________________________________

Gameplay becomes more and more challenging as you progress.

Collect coins for upgrades.

Challenge a friend to see who can get the highest score!
